QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cast(pat.medrec_key as bigint) as medrec_key, g.pat_key, replace(replace(replace(lab_test_result, chr(9), ' '), chr(10), ' '), chr(13), ' ') as value_source_value, case when lower(lab_test_result) = 'negative' then 45878583 when lower(lab_test_result) = 'positive' then 46237248 when lower(lab_test_result) = 'not detected' then 45880296 else 0 end as value_as_concept_id, case when numeric_value_operator = '>' then 4172704 when numeric_value_operator = '=>' then 4171755 when numeric_value_operator = '<=' then 4171754 when numeric_value_operator = '<' then 4171756 else 0 end as operator_concept_id, lab_test_loinc_code, collection_day_number, collection_time_of_day, result_unit, numeric_value, pat.adm_phy from {sc}.pat pat JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND pat.medrec_key = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE join {sc}.genlab g on pat.pat_key = g.pat_key order by cast(pat.medrec_key as bigint)
